content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (52.5, 51.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (52.5, 51.5)
- Electric poles at positions (55.5, 51.5) and (55.5, 54.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (stone-furnace) at position (1.0, 1.0)
- Burner mining drill at position (8.5, 1.5)
- Lab at position (6.5, 1.5)

### Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipes forming a pipe group

### Electric pole group
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric poles at positions (29.452380952380953, 30.738095238095237) and (30.253846153846155, 31.423076923076923)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure that the target location for placing electric poles is clear of any blocking entities or terrain that cannot accommodate the pole (e.g., water).

### Errors when inserting coal into steam engine
- Make sure there is a nearby entity that can accept coal before attempting to insert it into the steam engine.

### Errors when dealing with connection points
- Check for any blocking entities at the connection points of the steam engine before attempting to connect or place additional entities.
